text:
A exciting train journey from Los Ageles to Seattle by  Coaslal Starline operated by Amtrak. I took this video through the glass window of train compartment. This compartment is dedicated only for viewing with big glass windows on both sides and some portion of the roof. Kids from the sea beach were waving at us and we felt like we were also at the beach. Even though the train was late and it took like 45 hours instead of 35 hours people were not unhappy. We passed by the Cascade Range and Mount Shasta and beautiful forest areas.
